title: What is the song, “La Thune“ by Angèle, about? - Quora

response.answer_text: ‘’La Thune’’ is a casual way to call money. angèle is calling out the superficiality of today’s world, where everything is about appearances. ‘’ All they want is fame |…| you have to post it on Instagram to show it actually happened’’ she then goes on to the chorus, wondering what does it give when everybody’s so lonely behind their screens. although the whole song is about showing that she doesn’t give a f*** about this sort of lifestyle, she also admits being apart of this group of people and loves to be loved, even when it’S fake. it reflects what many people from our generation wonder: what does it give to be so open about your life and share everything online, when it actually just makes us lonelier.
